channel.title: Add item to bank

item.title: Add item to bank
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Anyone know how to add an item to bank. What I mean is, I give an item to people when they level up, but when they do it, sometimes their inventory is full. if (playerLevel[skill] > 90) setSkillLevel(skill, playerLevel[skill], playerXP[skill]); if (playerLevel[skill] == 99) addItem(1939, 1); Thatâ€™s how I have it. I want it to go into the bank instead. Any help?

Read full topic
